org.drip.analytics.curve

Class FXCurve

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer
      • org.drip.analytics.curve.FXCurve

  • public class FXCurve
extends Serializer
    This class contains the term structure of dates/times and FX forwards (PIP/outright), and Spot FX info for the given currency pair.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.drip.analytics.core.Serializer

        Creates an FXCurve from the CurrencyPair, FX Spot, and the FX Forward parameters
        Parameters:
        cp - CurrencyPair
        dtSpot - Spot Date
        dblFXSpot - FX Spot Rate
        adblDate - Array of dates
        adblFXFwd - Array of FX Forwards

        Parameters:
        valParam - ValuationParams
        dcNum - Discount Curve Numerator
        dcDenom - Discount Curve Denominator
        bBasisOnDenom - True if the basis is calculated on the denominator discount curve
